title: Chargers for work and home on sale for Green Monday
content: Wireless chargers are getting more exciting every year, and now they can even compete with their wired counterparts. The ORBIT Wireless Charger (2-Pack) is a powerful wireless charger that works perfectly with any Qi-Enabled devices, and for Green Monday it’s on sale for $21.59 (Reg. $36) with coupon code GREEN20.  This two-pack of chargers is 24% […]
